1.2.0.name: wordpress/disruptive-talk
1.2.0.description:
Disruptive talk phono widget. Use phono to allow your wordpress users to call a phone number right from your site, for free!

Optionally supports "proactive calls". After a defined amount of seconds, the widget will pop up as a jquery modal popup.

The phono widget can call any landline phone number, sip address, or Tropo application. Register your app at Tropo.com for extended functionality.

For more information check out http://disruptive.io/disruptivetalk-proactive-phono-wordpress-plugin-for-tropo/
